class_description:
An input stream that also maintains a checksum of the data being read.
 The checksum can then be used to verify the integrity of the input data.

Methods.method_description: Creates an input stream using the specified Checksum.
Returns the Checksum for this input stream.

return_description: the byte read, or -1 if the end of the stream is reached.

Methods.method_description: Reads a byte. Will block if no input is available.

params.param_description: the buffer into which the data is read
the start offset in the destination array b
the maximum number of bytes read

return_description:
the actual number of bytes read, or -1 if the end
            of the stream is reached.

Methods.method_description:
Reads into an array of bytes. If len is not zero, the method
 blocks until some input is available; otherwise, no
 bytes are read and 0 is returned.

params.param_description: the number of bytes to skip

return_description: the actual number of bytes skipped

Methods.method_description: Skips specified number of bytes of input.
